page.title: 18CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: Wymondham is well endowed with{clubs {and societies}having a particularly strong bias towards sports,music and youth organisations. The Dell Bowls Club ,The Youth- Centre Football club and the Tennis Club have international connections. The newly formed Community Orchestra is sponsored by Malcolm Arnold. Sports clubs and Music Societies cater for all ages and and for a wide range of tastes. There are many uniformed organisations including ATC and majorettes as well as the many which meet at the Scout and Guide Headquarters. There is a YCS Centre in the middle of the town and a varied range of adult classes meet at the High School. Wymondham has its own Society and Rotary, Lions and political clubs are all active.
